alert.note: Alert for Western Okanogan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 03 at 2:39PM PDT until November 04 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 10 and 20 inches near the Cascade crest. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Western Okanogan County County especially Highway 20 Washington Pass. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible heading to Washington Pass. Gusty winds with heavy west snow could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
